title: Rolled pavlova with peaches and blackberries
description: Billowy, chewy meringue encases sweet whipped cream and the best of late summer fruit. Rolling the meringue isn’t as tricky as it sounds, just take it slowly. Substitute the fruit with whatever is in season.
ingredients: 250g/9oz free-range egg whites, at room temperature (6 eggs or from a carton)
5 large, ripe peaches, cut into ½cm/¼in segments
